Title: Orbital Camera Controller
Description:
WPF component that allow user to easily control a camera the way most famous 3D applications do, such as 3D Studio MAX or Maya.
This component control a camera attached to a Viewport3D.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WPF component that allow user to easily control a camera the way most famous 3D applications do, such as 3D Studio MAX or Maya.
This component control a camera attached to a Viewport3D.

The interesting part of the code is in the OrbitalCameraController.cs file.
The whole application in just a sample demonstration code for usage.
